altTitles.en: Kaine - die to live no Endorphin
戒音 dieとliveの脳内麻薬物質
戒音・dieとliveのエンドルフィン

description.en:
1) **Kaine**  
Shinogu awakens from a coma in a hospital only to find out that his black hair has turned red and long. he looked exactly as his famous rock group vocalist twin brother - Kaine. Kaine was part of a group called Endorphines. Apparently someone tried to kill the two brothers off. However in a car accident Kaine died on the spot while Shinogu was in comatose state. in order to let Endorphines continue, their manager forced Shinogu to take over his brother's place, hoping no one will know the difference. Or will they? Kaine's best friend Die already started to suspect the fake-Kaine. meanwhile, one by one the fans of Endorphins began to commit suicide after listening to their latest CD. Die and 'Kaine' decide to investigate and are determined to find the truth.  
  
2) **Magical Mystery Tour**  
When a normal Japanese high school girl wins an all-expenses-paid trip to LA, it really does seem too good to be true…  
  
3) **Tokei Jikake no Orenji Bakudan (The Orange Time Bomb)**  
Takumi and Kai are members of the popular band, Orange. When rumors of Kai going solo start to spread, tension rises. Will they be able to stop what's happening? What's the mystery behind Takumi's sunglasses? Who's this strange girl that shows up claiming she wants to marry Takumi? What are Kai's true feelings?  
  
4) **Tokyo Top**  
A continuation of the 4th chapter: the story of how Gai met his girlfriend, Satsuki.

biography.en:
Circle(s): MOON CLOCK

The "Kaori" part of "Kaori Yuki" is her real name. She became a professional manga artist in 1987 after placing in one of the many contests held by Hana to Yume. She supposedly lives as a hermit with her cat, but very little is actually known about her.

As of October 2010, she has a six-year-old daughter and three-year-old son.
